articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung at Kumsusan Memorial Palace
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung at Kumsusan Memorial Palace
						
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, leading officials of party and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on Thursday on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Placed before the statue of the President was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the DPRK National Defence Commission, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 They paid high tribute to the statue of the President.
					
					 They paid homage in humble reverence to the President who fathered the immortal Juche idea to clearly indicate the road to be followed by the era and humankind, led the socialist motherland along the road of independence and prosperity and brought genuine happiness to the Korean people.
					
					 Commanding officers of the Korean People's Army also visited the palace and paid respects in profound reverence to the President who performed undying feats for the development of the revolutionary armed forces, socialist construction and human cause of independence.
					
					 Among the visitors were anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, servicepersons, people from all walks of life, home-visiting groups of Koreans in Japan, overseas compatriots, the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and its staff members and the diplomatic envoys, the military attaches corps, the economic and commercial councilors corps of different countries and representatives of international organizations here.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons, working people of all strata and school youth and children laid floral baskets before the  statues of President Kim Il Sung in different parts of the country on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of his demise.
					A crowd of people visited his statue on Mansu Hill.
					
					Seen before the statue was a floral basket from General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Laid before the statue were floral baskets in the name of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, the bodies of science, education, culture and art, public health and media, factories, enterprises, schools, etc. and the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, overseas compatriots and foreigners.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the statue, calling back on the brilliant revolutionary life and the noble exploits of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 A Changbaixian delegation of Jilin Province of China placed floral baskets before the statue of Kim Il Sung at the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo Memorial Tower in Hyesan City of Ryanggang Province and paid tribute to it.

articles.title: Foreigners Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Foreigners Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The family of Zhang Weihua, a Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, and the Switzerland-Korea Committee sent floral baskets to the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill Thursday to commemorate the 16th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Reception Marks Anniversary of DPRK-China Treaty
articles.content:
Reception Marks Anniversary of DPRK-China Treaty
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- A reception was given by the Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries and the China-Korea Friendship Association on Tuesday on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of the conclusion of the DPRK-China Treaty of Friendship, Cooperation and Mutual Assistance. 
					 Present there on invitation were DPRK Ambassador to China Choe Pyong Gwan and his embassy officials.
					
					 Wu Donghe, chairman of the China-Korea Friendship Association, the vice-president of the Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries, and other officials concerned were present there. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.
					
					 Wu Donghe said that the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship provided and cultivated by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries has struck its roots deep in the hearts of the two peoples. 
					
					 Both sides have developed the unbreakable friendly relations, understanding and valuing each other and overcoming all sorts of trials in the spirit of the treaty over the last 49 years since the conclusion of the treaty, he said.
					
					 He wished the Korean people greater victory in their efforts to open the gate to a thriving nation, defend the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, firmly rallied around the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Choe Pyong Gwan noted that the two countries have strengthened the ties of friendship, supporting and cooperating with each other in various domains and achieved a lot of successes in socialist construction in the past.
					
					Referring to General Secretary Kim Jong Il's success made in his historic visit to China in May, he expressed the stand to make positive efforts to boost the DPRK-China friendship in the spirit of the agreement reached between the top leaders of the two countries.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Gives Remembrance Meeting
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Gives Remembrance Meeting
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- A meeting of foreign crewmen took place at Chongjin Port on Wednesday to remember President Kim Il Sung on the 16th anniversary of his demise.
					 Present at the meeting were the captains and crewmen of Chinese-flagged ship "Zhonghua-18" and Togolese-flagged ship "Toei-maru". 
					
					 Speakers at the meeting recalled that the world progressives recollect with deep emotion the great revolutionary life of Kim Il Sung, outstanding elder statesman, with profound trust in him.
					
					 Kim Il Sung, upon embarking on the road of the revolution in his teens, founded the Juche idea and led to victory the struggle for sovereignty, independence and socialism, they said, adding:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was an outstanding leader and the great sun of mankind as he clearly indicated the way not only for the Korean people but for other revolutionary people of the world to follow.
					
					 He made a great contribution to the history of the development of world politics, they noted, adding that his exploits would always remain shining with the century.

articles.title: Remembrance Concert Given
articles.content:
Remembrance Concert Given
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- A remembrance concert "Eternal Smile" was given at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Thursday on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Put on the stage were chorus "Our Leader" and "We Are Yearning for Your Sunny Smile", violin solo and chorus "Nostalgia", immortal masterpiece, female solo "O, the Unforgettable Dawn When Seeing the Leader" and other numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the immortal exploits the President performed by liberating the country from the yoke of the Japanese imperialists through long journeys of bloody anti-Japanese battles despite snow storms and building a man-centered socialist power on this land.
					
					Their repertoire included female duet "Vinalon of 3,000-ri," mixed quartet "His Ideal", female quintet and chorus "The Door to Happiness Opens" which deal with the exciting reality in which the people's ideal is coming true on this land under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il. These numbers convinced the audience that the drive for building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation is sure to be crowned with victory soon.   
					
					 Among the audience were senior party, army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, persons of merit, working people in the city, overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.

articles.title: Remembrance Events Held
articles.content:
Remembrance Events Held
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Working people from all walks of life and school youth and children in the DPRK commemorated the 16th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung in humble reverence.
					 They placed floral baskets and flowers before the statues and beaming images of the President in Pyongyang and other parts of the country.
					
					 Artistes of North Hamgyong, Ryanggang and other provincial art troupes held remembrance concerts under such titles as "Our President" and "The world knows no such great man as our President", at which they loudly sang of the revolutionary career and immortal feats of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Remembrance concerts were also arranged by trade union members and other workers, youth and students and women's union members in Kangwon, Jagang and South Hwanghae provinces.
					
					 Put on the stages of the remembrance meetings and concerts held in Hamhung, Wonsan, Kaesong and other places were such numbers as dialogic poem "The Sun and Glow", and female solo "Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Are Just the Same".
					
					 An "Evening of campers missing the Generalissimo" took place at children's camps across the country.

articles.title: Strict Measures Taken to Prevent Flood Damage
articles.content:
Strict Measures Taken to Prevent Flood Damage
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Nationwide anti-flood measures are taken in Korea in every July and August.
					 Large and minor hydro-electric power stations across the country including Kangwon, Jagang and South Hamgyong Provinces have properly repaired and readjusted dams, intakes, waterways and other structures. 
					
					 Collieries and mines in the central and northern parts of the country including Anju, Sunchon and Tanchon areas have checked, repaired and reinforced drainage equipment in time to keep pits, excavated coal and ores from being inundated and washed away.
					
					 Thorough measures have been taken in the railway transport sector to protect from flood railroads, railway bridges, retaining walls and other railway facilities and structures in the northern inland and on the east coast. 
					
					 Co-op farms in South Hwanghae and North and South Phyongan Provinces are improving waterways and ditches to protect land, crops and agricultural production facilities from any heavy rainfall.
					
					 The sectors of the land and city management are checking the rivers, waterways, reservoirs, sewerage networks and storm sewerage system to remedy defects. 
					
					 Lock gates are kept ready to open sluices any time.
					
					 The hydrometeorological services are trying to ensure promptness and correctness in weather forecast.

articles.title: Mosaics Erected at Different Units
articles.content:
Mosaics Erected at Different Units 
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Mosaics depicting President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il were erected at different units.
					 The working people of the Hyesan Disabled Soldiers' Daily Necessities Factory in Ryanggang Province and those in Paekgok-ri of Singye County and Sangha-ri of Rinsan County in North Hwanghae Province erected mosaics "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Will Always Be with Us," carrying with them strong yearning for Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea.
					
					 Mosaic "The Respected Father Comrade Kim Il Sung Will Always Be Alive in the Hearts of the People" depicting the smiling President always remembered by the Korean people was erected at Sariwon Chongnyon Railway Station in North Hwanghae Province.
					
					The mosaic erected in the township of Kujang County of North Phyongan Province depicts the President who set out on the "1,000-ri Journey for Learning" in his teens, bearing deep in mind the words of his father that a Korean should know well about his country.
					
					 Mosaics dealing with the noble personality of the President who ceaselessly visited every nook and corner of the country were erected at the Hyesan Youth Mine and in Kumya-ri, Changsong County of North Phyongan Province. 
					
					 The mosaic erected at the Ryongho Co-op Farm in Raknang District, Pyongyang, portrays Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il feasting their eyes on the farm fields visited by bumper crops, their faces beaming with a broad smile.
					
					 Ceremonies for the completion of the mosaics were held at the relevant units.

articles.title: Monument to Kim Il Sung's Signature Visited
articles.content:
Monument to Kim Il Sung's Signature Visited
						
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of visitors are flowing to the monument to President Kim Il Sung's signature in Panmunjom. Among them are servicepersons, working people from all walks of life in the DPRK, youth and students, overseas compatriots and foreigners.
					 Inscribed on the monument are "Kim Il Sung on July 7, 1994", autographic signature the President made on a document related to national reunification in the last moments of his life.
					
					 A large number of servicepersons, working people and youth and students of the DPRK have visited this monument over the last five years.
					
					 It was also visited by over 7,200 delegations and visiting groups and delegates, including the delegation of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, the foreign minister of Thailand and his party, the president of the World Federation of Democratic Youth, diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here and the home visiting group of Koreans in the U.S.

articles.title: Kumsusan Memorial Palace Visited
articles.content:
Kumsusan Memorial Palace Visited
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The Kumsusan Assembly Hall was consecrated as a solemn and grand memorial palace on July 8, Juche 84 (1995) under the meticulous care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Since the memorial palace where President Kim Il Sung lies in state for perpetuity was opened to visitors a large number of servicepersons, people from all walks of life and youth and students across the country, other compatriots from south Korea and overseas and foreigners have visited the sacred temple of Juche to pay highest tribute to him.
					
					 Among the visitors to the memorial palace were at least 52,000 compatriots from south Korea and overseas and more than 73,700 foreign guests including diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here and delegations from different countries.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Sunny Smile Kept in Mind of Korean People
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Sunny Smile Kept in Mind of Korean People
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- On the occasion of the anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's demise, July 8, the Korean people are recollecting his life devoted to the happiness of the people. 
					 He defeated two imperialisms in one generation and built a powerful socialist state on ruins of war.
					
					 When visiting factories, he shook hands with workers and asked about their wishes and when visiting farms, he brightly smiled to see swaying rice ears.
					
					 Hearing the news that good hauls were made in the east sea, he sang a folk song about fishery.
					
					 When he inspected an army unit, he took a photo of a soldier and gave him three copies for his family, his company and his future wife.
					
					 After enjoying schoolchildren's New Year performance, he said that he felt ten years younger and danced with them.
					
					 Even in his last days he made on-the-spot guidance tour and signed a document concerning the country's reunification.
					
					 His field guidance tour reached all parts and places of the country, including the Chollima Steel Complex, Songjin Steel Complex, Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex and Februay 8 Vinalon Complex. 
					
					 His bright smile is still encouraging the Korean people in their effort for the building of a great, prosperous and powerful nation.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Demise Editorially Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Demise Editorially Observed
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Leading papers Thursday dedicate editorials to the 16th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the President will always be with the army and people of the DPRK dashing ahead like the wind towards a final victory in the drive for building a great prosperous and powerful nation and the road of Juche explored by the President is an ever- victorious one for glorifying the DPRK as a thriving nation. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The road of Juche indicated by the President is the road of justice for turning the country into a powerful nation of the people where their ideal will become a brilliant reality and a path of national self-reliance for bolstering up the national power in every way by our own efforts in our own way.
					
					 It is also a road of effecting a great revolutionary surge along which the popular masses are working epoch-making miracles by giving full play to their ideological and moral power.
					
					 It was the motto for building a power maintained by the President all his life, the maxim that when building a state, it is necessary to set up a popular state in which the popular masses become masters and when setting a goal for building a thriving nation it is necessary to build a country where the people live with nothing to desire more in the world. 
					
					 It was under the leadership of the President that the Korean people opened the gate to an industrial power by their own efforts and their own way despite ruins where not a single brick was available and worked epoch-making miracles in every period of the revolution and construction and at its each phase.
					
					 The President attached importance to ideological and moral power of the popular masses and unrolled a history of building a power with this as an ever-victorious weapon. His greatness finds full manifestation in the on-going drive for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The DPRK has adorned its proud history with victory and glory along the road of Juche indicated by the President. It has greeted a great heyday of prosperity under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					Minju Joson calls on all the Korean people to unite close around the headquarters of the revolution led by Kim Jong Il and dynamically advance to realize the people's ideal so much desired by the President.

articles.title: Probe into Truth behind "Cheonan" Case Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Probe into Truth behind "Cheonan" Case Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The Democratic Party and three other opposition parties of south Korea submitted a written request to the "National Assembly" on Monday demanding "investigation into the state policy" over the case of sinking of warship "Cheonan", according to the south Korean KBS.
					 The written request said that the ins and outs formed the "NA ad hoc committee for probing the truth behind the case of warship 'Cheonan'" but no progress has been made in the investigation as yet, underscoring the need to clear the doubts through the "investigation into the state policy".

articles.title: Crackdown on Progressive Forces Slashed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Crackdown on Progressive Forces Slashed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Members of the Solidarity for Progress and its affiliated organizations in various parts of south Korea held a rally in Seoul on July 3 denouncing the puppet authorities' crackdown. 
					 Speakers at the rally accused the "Intelligence Service" (IS) of unreasonably investigating members of the Solidarity for Progress on charges of the violation of the "National Security Law" (NSL) after branding their exchange and cooperation with the north conducted legally after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration as "espionage." 
					
					 Recalling that the IS, in particular, in the course of its investigation questioned about the activities conducted by the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, they declared that this showed who is the target of the next suppression. 
					
					 They termed this repressive campaign a premeditated crackdown of the security authorities to eliminate the progressive forces. 
					
					 They called upon the organizations grouping people of various circles to go united and struggle against the crackdown of the authorities based on the NSL.

articles.title: Anniversary of July 4 Joint Statement Observed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anniversary of July 4 Joint Statement Observed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification on July 4 made public a statement titled "Let us drive out the U.S. forces and the anti-reunification traitorous forces, holding high the three principles of national reunification".
					 Recalling that 38 years have passed since the publication of the July 4 joint statement which clarified the three principles of national reunification --independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity--, the statement said that on this day the organization is full of the will to devote everything to implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and wage a dynamic struggle for peace against the U.S. and war, more firmly adhering to the three principles of national reunification. 
					
					 The statement noted with apprehension that the case of warship "Cheonan" cooked up by the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak regime pushed the situation on the Korean Peninsula to a dangerous phase. 
					
					 It accused the authorities of intensifying the anti-reunification and confrontation moves such as war exercises for invading the DPRK, the resumption of the  psychological warfare in the areas along the Military Demarcation Line and suppression of organizations for the reunification movement and patriotic personages with the warship case as a momentum.
					
					 We will sternly punish the group of traitors keen on the dependence on outside forces and anti-reunification actions on behalf of the compatriots, warned the statement. 
					
					 All Koreans should go united in the spirit of "By our nation itself" and drive the U.S. forces and the traitors out of this land without fail, declared the statement.

articles.title: 80th Anniversary of Kalun Meeting Marked
articles.content:
80th Anniversary of Kalun Meeting Marked 
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Briefings took place by the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics and a company of Malaysia on June 24 and 28 on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of the Kalun meeting organized by President Kim Il Sung. 
					  The chairman of the group spoke of the main contents of Kim Il Sung's work "The Path of the Korean Revolution", saying that the President clearly indicated the path to be followed by the Korean revolution at the meeting. 
					
					 He stressed that Kim Il Sung is the sun of humankind as he defeated the Japanese imperialist aggressors through the anti-Japanese armed struggle and liberated Korea. 
					
					    The manager of a company of Malaysia referred to the Kalun meeting which indicated the path of the Korean revolution, adding: The Workers' Party of Korea, regarding the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung as its guiding idea, turned into an invincible party whose members are single-mindedly united with its roots deeply struck among the popular masses thanks to the experienced and seasoned leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He expressed belief that under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the WPK and the Korean people would achieve bigger success in their drive for opening the gate to a thriving nation in 2012.

articles.title: Events Held in Mexico and Brazil
articles.content:
Events Held in Mexico and Brazil
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- A seminar and a film show were held in Mexico and a Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition opened with due ceremony in Brazil on June 30 and July 1 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					Displayed in the venue of the exhibition were photos on the revolutionary history of Kim Il Sung and the feats performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, works of the peerlessly great men, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handiworks associated with the wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The president of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism said that 16 years have passed since his demise but the Korean people and the world progressive people highly praise him as the eternal leader of the Korean people and the great leader of the movement for global independence. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung steered the Korean revolution and the world revolution to a victory, performing undying feats, he said, adding that the validity and vitality of the Juche idea and the Songun idea founded by him have been brought into full play day by day. 
					
					 The mayor of Guara City of the Brasilia Federal District in Brazil said that Kim Il Sung, born into a poor peasant family, grew up witnessing the wretched fate of the people under the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule. He went on to say: The President embarked on the road of revolution in his teens and liberated the country by waging an armed struggle and thus provided the Korean people with a free and happy life. 
					
					 The Korean people have worked hard to build a great prosperous and powerful nation, firmly united around Kim Jong Il identical to Kim Il Sung in his popular personality.
					
					 Screened at the film show was a Korean film on the revolutionary activities conducted by Kim Il Sung in 1994, the last year of his great life.

articles.title: Bulletin on Korean War Issued
articles.content:
Bulletin on Korean War Issued 
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The Colombia-Korea Association of Friendship and Culture issued bulletin titled "United States, first lost war" on June 26 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The bulletin in an article said as follows:
					
					  When the United States provoked the Korean War in the 1950s, it calculated that it could easily occupy the young DPRK, counting on its numerical advantage and technical superiority.
					
					 The U.S. mobilized in the war more than two million-strong effectives including one third of its ground force, one fifth of its air force and the most of its Pacific fleet and those of its 15 satellite countries and the south Korean army.
					
					 The bulletin enumerated facts proving that the U.S. sustained big loss and defeat beyond imagination, even though it bluffed that the Korean War was already doomed. The U.S. suffered nearly 2.3 times as much loss as those it sustained in the Pacific War during the Second World War, it noted. 
					
					 It stressed: 
					
					 The Korean War clearly proved that no force on earth can browbeat the people and army who turned out with their firm determination not to become slaves of the imperialists again but to protect their country and system united around their leader with one mind and purpose. It also taught the people a bitter lesson of history that those who violate justice and peace and find pleasure in aggression and war will meet only death and defeat. 
					
					 The U.S. had better not forget a bitter lesson drawn from its defeat 57 years ago.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- One day in March Juche 62 (1973), President Kim Il Sung visited a spa in then Kangso County.
					 Looking at the gush with satisfaction, the President suggested the construction of a mineral water factory at the place. 
					
					 He then calculated the mineral water processing capacity and clarified issues concerning the construction, production of mineral water and bottles and their transport.  
					
					 He also suggested calling the bottled water "Kangso Mineral Water".
					
					 When the construction project was progressing at the final stage, he visited the site again and set forth tasks to be fulfilled to supply the mineral water to the people as early as possible.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige nuevo proceso productivo de hortalizas aderezadas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige nuevo proceso productivo de hortalizas aderezada
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente   Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el proceso productivo de jang-ajji (hortalizas aderezadas en la salsa de soya), nuevamente construido en el Combinado de Alimentos perteneciente a la Unidad 534 del EPC.
					  Al recorrer varios procesos productivos, el Dirigente se entero detalladamente del estado de construccion, equipamiento tecnico y produccion y aprecio la produccion cuantiosa de alimentos peculiares en los procesos bien acondicionados.
					
					  Senalo que jang-ajji ha sido desde la antiguedad el plato favorito de consumo popular y es posible producirla facilmente en cualquier lugar del pais.
					
					  El PTC tiene la voluntad y decision de ofrecer lo mejor a nuestros militares, dijo y enfatizo que todos los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la fabrica deben incrementar incesantemente la produccion dando pruebas de su calido amor por los soldados para enviar a los uniformados muchas hortalizas aderezadas de distintas variedades y otros  alimentos sabrosos, nutritivos y saludables.
					
					  El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en la administracion de la fabrica.
					
					  A fin de enviar a los militares mucho mas alimentos de buena calidad, hay que prestar primordial atencion a normalizar en un alto nivel la produccion, subrayo y agrego que para este fin, hace falta realizar la modernizacion y la fundamentacion cientifica de los procesos productivos y suministrar en lo suficiente las materias primas y los materiales necesarios a la produccion.
					
					  Puesto que esta fabrica produce y maneja los alimentos para los militares, es preciso elevar incesantemente la calidad de las mercancias y prestar especial atencion al ambiente higienico y cultural, en particular, a asegurar en el nivel supremo la seguridad higienica en el embalaje, apunto.
					
					Para suministrar a tiempo a las unidades militares los alimentos producidos, hay que disponer de suficientes envases y recipientes convenientes, enseno.
					
					 Finalmente, el Dirigente expreso su gran esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica contribuiran mucho a la mejora de la vida alimentaria de los militares.
					
					  En esta ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por Jang Song Thaek, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui y Thae Jong Su, jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, y Ju Kyu Chang, Ri Jae Il y Han Kwang Sang, primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige la obra de la central Kunmin de Wonsan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige la obra de la central Kunmin de Wonsan
						
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente   Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, realizo una visita de orientacion sobre el campo de construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica Kunmin de Wonsan.
					La produccion electrica en esta planta de gran dimension requiere cambiar el curso del rio local, que corre al Mar Oeste, hacia el Mar Este.
					
					  Tras escuchar las explicaciones frente al plano, recorrio varios puntos del campo de construccion cerciorandose en detalles de la marcha de la obra.
					
					  El Dirigente dijo que es un milagro asombroso el hecho de que los miembros de la brigada juvenil y otros constructores y voluntarios impulsan esta enorme obra con las fuerzas propias superando la estrechez material y otras dificultades.
					
					Evaluo altamente los meritos de ellos quienes preparan el patrimonio de eterna duracion dando pruebas de su abnegacion patriotica y heroismo masivo, y les envio su cordial saludo.
					
					  Destaco que en el pasado, la provincia de Kangwon termino con exito las dificiles obras de la Central Hidroelectrica Juventud No.2 de Anbyon, la Central Hidroelectrica Juventud de Wonsan y la Salina de Wonsan que acompanan la transformacion de la naturaleza de gran dimension y hoy vuelve a crear el milagro que asombra a todo el mundo en la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica Kunmin de Wonsan.
					
					  Prosiguio que esto es una muestra magnifica de la gran e inagotable potencia espiritual del pueblo coreano unido monoliticamente en torno al Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					  Diciendo que las organizaciones del partido y las entidades de masas en esta provincia hicieron muchos trabajos en un ano y pico movilizando el poderio espiritual de los militantes del partido y los trabajadores, apunto que sus experiencias ratifican otra vez la veracidad del modo de trabajo de nuestro partido consistente en que todo es posible si organizan y movilizan correctamente las fuerzas y la inteligencia de las masas.
					
					  Hoy cuando todo el pueblo avanza de viento en popa hacia la cima de la gran potencia prospera, se construyen a lo largo y ancho del pais las grandes obras monumentales que representan la epoca del Songun, destaco y prosiguio en tono orgulloso que este cambio esplendido deviene la manifestacion del gran e indoblegable poderio espiritual del heroico pueblo coreano que avanza y salta sin parar.
					
					Subrayo que la central en cuestion es patrimonio precioso del pais a legar a las generaciones venideras y por lo tanto, hay que construirla perfecta para que no tenga defectos ni en el remoto futuro.
					
					Continuo que construir la central hidroelectrica es economico y el camino mas rapido para cubrir suficientemente la creciente demanda de la electricidad y senalo la necesidad de seguir materializando cabalmente la politica del partido de construir en gran medida las plantas electricas de mediano y pequeno tamanos junto con las grandes.
					
					El Dirigente presento la direccion detallada y remedios para cumplir con anticipacion la obra.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta visita el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Kangwon, Paek Kye Ryong, el vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Thae Jong Su, y los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang y Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: Rinden tributo a Kim Il Sung en Palacio Memorial Kumsusan
articles.content:
Rinden tributo a Kim Il Sung en Palacio Memorial Kumsusan 
						
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 16o aniversario del fallecimiento del Presidente   Kim Il Sung, los cuadros del partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo y los funcionarios directivos de los organismos del partido y el Poder, organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales rindieron tributo el dia 8 al Presidente  Kim Il Sung en el Palacio Memorial Kumsusan.
					Ante la estatua de pie del Presidente en este lugar estaba colocado un cesto de flores a nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Comite de Defensa Nacional, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Los participantes rindieron homenaje al Presidente quien al crear la inmortal idea Juche, ilumino claramente el camino a seguir por la epoca y humanidad, condujo la patria socialista a la senda de independencia y prosperidad y procuro la felicidad verdadera al pueblo coreano.
					
					En el mismo lugar los miembros de mando del Ejercito Popular de Corea expresaron este viernes homenaje al Presidente quien hizo inmortal aporte al fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, la construccion socialista y el cumplimiento de la causa de la independencia de la humanidad.
					
					Por otra parte, el mismo dia hicieron otro tanto los ex combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y trabajadores de distintos sectores.
					
					Lo hicieron tambien los grupos de coreanos residentes en Japon, de visita a su patria, los compatriotas que viven en ultramar, el representante y otros miembros de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises, el Cuerpo de Agregados Militares, el de Consejeros Economicos y Comerciales y los representantes de las organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea.

articles.title: Se dinamizan en Corea preparativos frente a la inundacion
articles.content:
Se dinamizan en Corea preparativos frente a la inundacion
						
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ATCC) -- En cada julio y agosto se realizan en Corea como campana nacional los preparativos para evitar los danos a causa de inundaciones.
					Actualmente, las centrales hidroelectricas de diferentes tamanos de las provincias de Kangwon, de Jagang, de Hamgyong del Sur y de otras localidades realizan la reparacion minuciosa sobre las construcciones hidraulicas, tales como los diques, las canas para la retencion de aguas y los canales.
					
					Las minas de carbon y de minerales de las zonas centrales y septentrionales del pais, incluyendo las Anju, Sunchon y Tanchon, reparan y refuerzan a tiempo los equipos de desague para evitar que sean sumergidas las galerias.
					
					Ademas, toman las medidas para el almacenamiento de los carbones y los minerales extraidos.
					
					Tambien en el sector de transporte ferroviario se toman las medidas de seguridad de las instalaciones y estructuras ferroviarias, tales como el ferrocarril y los puentes de hierro y los muros de contencion en la zona interior septentrional y la zona litoral del Mar Este.
					
					Las granjas cooperativas de las provincias de Hwanghae del Sur, de Phyong-an del Sur y del Norte concentran sus fuerzas en el arreglo de los canales de desague y zanjas para evitar el hundimiento de las tierras cultivables, plantaciones agricolas e instalaciones productivas agricolas aun bajo las lluvias torrenciales inesperadas.
					
					Las ramas de cuidado territorial y de urbanismo chequearon generalmente las condiciones de recursos fluviales, canales, depositos de aguas y las redes de alcantarillado y de escape de precipitaciones y estan reparando con prisa los puntos defectuosos.
					
					El sector de la gestion de las compuertas esta listo para sacar el agua durante las posibles inundaciones.
					
					La rama meteorologica e hidrologica garantiza la rapidez y la exactitud de sus informaciones y pronosticos de inundaciones y tiempo.
